actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution to establish the Select Committee on Water Resources.

summary.text: Establishes within the House of Representatives a Select Committee on Water Resources. Authorizes the Committee to: (1) conduct a continuing comprehensive study and review of the problems of water supply; (2) review any recommendations by the President, or other executive departments or agencies, relating to programs or policies affecting water resources; and (3) recommend legislation with respect to problems or policies affecting water resources. Requires the Committee to submit an annual report to the House of Representatives summarizing its activities.

titles.title: A resolution to establish the Select Committee on Water Resources.
